articles.description: Liam Treadwell, who won the 2009 Grand National on 100/1 shot Mon Mome, has died aged 34. He rode more than 300 winners in a lengthy and successful career
articles.content:
Tributes are being paid to Grand National-winning jockey Liam Treadwell, who has died aged 34.
The sportsman, who triumphed at Aintree in 2009 on 100/1 shot Mon Mome, rode more than 300 winners in a… [+3692 chars]

articles.author: Alex Milne
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo breaks yet another record during Juventus win over Bologna - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Portuguese superstar opened the scoring with a penalty in the 23rd minute and a strike by Paulo Dybala 13 minutes later gave Maurizio Sarri's side a comfortable victory
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo has continued to shatter the record books after his goal in Juventus ' 2-0 win over Bologna on Monday saw him become the leading Portuguese scorer in Serie A history. 
The 35-year-… [+1825 chars]

articles.title: Katie Hopkins reveals tweet to Wales rugby star is the reason she's been kicked off Twitter - Wales Online
articles.description: Hopkins has been permanently banned from the social media platform
articles.content:
Katie Hopkins was banned from Twitter for a message she sent to Welsh rugby player Ashton Hewitt, it has emerged.
